channel.title: Suggest New Section
channel.description:
Hello Moparscapers And Staff!
I have a 317 server as well as a z508 server and was wondering if you could possibly add a 508 section for server help. I have noticed when I am ever in need for some help regarding 508 + no one is there to support me.
Rune-S***.org has made a section like this and it works great! so i hope someone can give this some thought.
Thanks So Much,
Brandon

item.title: Suggest New Section
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

yea for example you can see what r-s.org did.

they made a 317 topic and in that was client problems section, server problem section, tut section etc. its very organized and will help alot of players so they can filter there searches more. so when they search for an error about 317 they dont get added 508 problems to there search making it harder for them.

if your not sure about this try opening a poll possibly and see what the community wants?

just trying to help

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest New Section
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

So just separate server sections? What about the clients?

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest New Section
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

i think it would be better to have more than one so people who specialize in 317 will be in 317, and those who specialize in 508+ will be on other section. otherwise the people with 508 + problems get booted down the list because of the majority if 317 posts.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest New Section
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Why canâ€™t the same section be used for all protocols?
